events.message: Customer reported a collision involving their car and a roadside barrier causing significant front-end damage.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident due to keywords such as vehicle, collision, and damage.
An insurance agent has been assigned to handle this auto accident claim and coordinate all next steps.
Acknowledgement sent to the customer confirming receipt of the auto accident claim and initiation of processing.
Request sent for vehicle registration, accident photos, police report, and repair estimates for further assessment.
Customer submitted all requested documents including photos, police report, and repair estimates for review.
Investigation into the circumstances and extent of the auto accident damage has officially begun.
Investigation finalized confirming the collision was covered under policy terms with no discrepancies found.
A settlement offer was proposed to the claimant covering repair costs and associated expenses.
Customer provided positive feedback expressing satisfaction with the timely claim processing and proposed settlement.
Claim approval was granted following customer acceptance of the settlement offer on the auto accident claim.
The agreed settlement amount was disbursed to the customerâ€™s account for vehicle repairs and damages.
The auto accident claim has been successfully closed after full payment and final customer confirmation.
All case files and documents related to this auto accident claim have been archived for record-keeping.
